mapper.select:
SELECT A.REVIEW_NO AS REVIEW_NO , PRODUCT_NO AS PRODUCT_NO , CONTENT AS CONTENT , A.FARMER_NO AS FARMER_NO , A.USER_NO AS USER_NO , C.NAME AS FARMER_NAME , B.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , REG_DATE AS REG_DATE , REVIEW_SCORE AS REVIEW_SCORE , D.SAVE_PATH AS FILE_PATH , D.FILE_RENAME AS FILE_NAME FROM REVIEW A LEFT JOIN USER_TB B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO LEFT JOIN FARMER C ON A.FARMER_NO = C.FARMER_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW_FILE D ON A.REVIEW_NO = D.REVIEW_NO
WHERE A.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO IN (${reviewNos})
DELETE FROM REVIEW_FILE WHERE REVIEW_NO IN (${reviewNos})
